About Me

Hi, I'm Ayush Kumar a 2nd-year Bachelor in Computer Application student at Graphic Era University, Dehradun, graduating in 2026. Passionate about full-stack web development, I specialize in MERN stack, data structures, and algorithmic problem-solving. I enjoy building real-world projects that combine efficient coding, clean architecture, and responsive design. Actively seeking internship opportunities to apply my skills in web development, automation, and software optimization, while continuously learning emerging technologies like React.js, Node.js, and database management.
